description:
This module will spread over two semesters providing students with the opportunity of analysing the processes involved in nursing research and evaluating different research methodologies. It will enable students to develop
a research proposal for their graduate studies. The topics include quantitative, qualitative and mixed-methods research designs, methods of sampling and sample size planning, data collection as well as methods of quantitative
and qualitative data analysis.
title: Research Methods
department: Alice Lee Center for Nursing Studies
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
